a system of organization in which people or things are divided into levels of importance
She worked her way up through the corporate hierarchy to become president.
the most important and powerful members of an organization
an organization or structure in which the staff are organized in levels and the people at one level have authority over those below them
Many companies have restructured theirorganizational hierarchies.
the key men in the company hierarchy
a structure in which files, information etc are organized in levels, each one being reached from the previous one
Each disk is divided into a hierarchy of directories.
